amendatorysection.catchline: Licensee; deductions authorized; tickets; wagers; requirements.
amendatorysection.para: A licensee may deduct up to five percent from the winnings of the holder of a winning ticket purchased through a teleracing facility or through telephonic wagering. All tickets purchased through telewagering shall bear distinctive markings, and such tickets may be redeemed at the teleracing facility or at the licensed racetrack owning or operating the facility. All wagers made through a teleracing facility shall be subject to all of the laws and conditions pertaining to wagers made at a licensed racetrack.
